quotes.quote: Mathematics may be defined as the subject in which we never know what we are talking about, nor whether what we are saying is true.
Mathematics is made of 50 percent formulas, 50 percent proofs, and 50 percent imagination.
Philosophy is a game with objectives and no rules. Mathematics is a game with rules and no objectives.
Mathematics is the art of giving the same name to different things.
Mathematics consists in proving the most obvious thing in the least obvious way.
In mathematics, you don't understand things. You just get used to them.
Mathematics is like love; a simple idea, but it can get complicated.
If people do not believe that mathematics is simple, it is only because they do not realize how complicated life is.
Mathematics is like checkers in being suitable for the young, not too difficult, amusing, and without peril to the state.
The essence of mathematics is not to make simple things complicated, but to make complicated things simple.
There are two ways to do great mathematics. The first is to be smarter than everybody else. The second way is to be stupider than everybody else -- but persistent.
Arithmetic is being able to count up to twenty without taking off your shoes.
The greatest unsolved theorem in mathematics is why some people are better at it than others.

Mathematics is not a deductive science – that's a cliché. When you try to prove a theorem, you don't just list the hypotheses, and then start to reason. What you do is trial and error, experimentation, guesswork.
Mathematics should be fun.
Mathematics is written for mathematicians.
Mathematics is the supreme judge; from its decisions there is no appeal.
The essence of mathematics resides in its freedom.
Mathematics is a great motivator for all humans.. Because its career starts with zero and it never end (infinity).
The study of mathematics, like the Nile, begins in minuteness but ends in magnificence.
Do the math, do the math baby it's the curse of money, once you got it, fool you got it.
Goodbye, some many niggas, lied to have funny what a muthafucka do for math.
Very good at doin' math it's funny that you ask, we was speedin to the bag.
Put your money on the table and  get your math on, break it down split it up get your laugh on.
To keep me on that right path and right math cause you plus nothin is everything.
Even went out his way so you could check in an extra bag now you wanna divide the yam like it equate the math.
If you can do the math on that then do the science too move around wit 4 pound or a 9 or two
Contemplating know how to work my math and bred story I don't work my fingers to the bone until they bled storin'
I gets duece 5 a show, do 5 a week let y'all do the math, that's aight for me.
I was lousy at math, a failed historian I was the quarterback in the back of the class.
And lyric which so heavily rhytmic In magic do I build, but math do be equally compatible.
Never shot handbrawl but I smoke a little grass, who? Clever with the math Queens remember boom bash tricks?
What do you do when you don't have a friend I'm sittin in class trying to focus on math.
A math-a-gician, I was taught to subtract anything to distrct the type of paper that I'm trying to attract.
I all want to do is walk up and tak to you I all want to do is write up my math for you.
Brolic, extra large, dynamic, crack your ceramic in half go aginst the grain, we feedin you math.
Here I am bored, man, sittin in my class how much longer? Yo, let me get this bathroom pass.
So, study the maths, study the code study yuh gyal, study the road.
Arithmetic is numbers you squeeze from your head to your hand to your pencil to your paper till you get the answer.
Dear Math, please grow up and solve your own problems, I'm tired of solving them for you.
I am still waiting for the day I'll use mathematics integration in real Life.
Mathematics is a game played according to certain simple rules with meaningless marks on paper.
That awkward moment when you finish a math problem and your answer isn't even one of the choices.
Math is fun, it teaches you life and death information, like when you're cold, you should go to a corner since it's 90 degrees there.
If there is a 50-50 chance that something can go wrong, then 9 times out of ten it will.
But in the new (math) approach, the important thing is to understand what you're doing, rather than to get the right answer.
Arithmetic is where numbers fly like pigeons in and out of your head.

Mathematics is not a deductive science that's a clichÃ©. When you try to prove a theorem, you don't just list the hypotheses, and then start to reason. What you do is trial and error, experimentation, guesswork.
